Actions.Name: Demonweb
Actions.Description: Create a small blast area of difficult and dangerous terrain in range. Foes in the area are vulnerable+. This [name] and allies are immune to its effects.

Actions.Name: Deadly Strand
Actions.Description: The [name] chooses a character in range 2 of a demonweb. That character is teleported into the closest space of the demonweb. Foes can save to avoid this effect.
